name: Toliet Bowl Fever
description:
Starting off, you are a news reporter named Eliah that has suffered from severe depresion due to losing everyone that he has cared for throughout his entire life. One day, he had received a news about his dead grandparents who had kept a magical toliet bowl that contains a powerful curse that would change his entire and make it whole again. So with all of his remaining hope, Eliah decided to venture out into the forest where his grandparents had kept the toliet bowl in order to find the cursed toliet bowl. But before he is able to find it, he must first overcome his inner demons.

FYI, this game is just a prototype and a work submission for our assignment, so truly sorry if there's a ton of bugs and confusing moments.
